Automatic Medical Knowledge Graph Construction
TEXT
KNOWLEDGE 
GRAPH
(KG)
Developing an automated framework to generate domain-specific KGs for the electronic 
health sector, aimed at assisting medical professionals in the decision-making process.
Joel Pardo (Second Year PhD Candidate), 
Ontology Engineering Group, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid
PAPER & POSTER
SEPLN PhD Symposium
2024, Valladolid, Spain
speaker: SYSTEM
